objectives.primary_objective: Understand the difference between living and non-living things - Recap & Practice – Living vs Non-Living

content_blocks.text: Today we learn about recap & practice – living vs non-living.
Living things grow, move, and need food. Non-living things do not.
Look around and name one living and one non-living thing.
Living things breathe, grow, and reproduce. Non-living things do not.
